mapper.select: SELECT D1.PD_CD AS ITM_PD_CD , D1.PD_ABBR_NM AS PD_ABBR_NM , D1.SAP_MAT_CD , D4.PD_PRP_VAL19 AS ITM_KND_CD , D5.WARE_NO , D5.WARE_NM , D5.STD_WARE_USE_YN , D3.PITM_STOC_A_GD_QTY , TRIM(D2.ITM_LCT_ANGLE_VAL) AS ITM_LCT_ANGLE_VAL , D2.ITM_LCT_COF_VAL , D2.ITM_LCT_FLOR_NO_VAL , D2.ITM_LCT_MAT_GRP_CD , TRIM( F_CMZ_CD_NM('TNT_WELLS', 'LCT_ANGLE_CD', D2.ITM_LCT_ANGLE_VAL, #{session.langId}) || ' ' || F_CMZ_CD_NM('TNT_WELLS', 'LCT_COF_CD', D2.ITM_LCT_COF_VAL, #{session.langId}) || ' ' || F_CMZ_CD_NM('TNT_WELLS', 'LCT_FLOR_NO_CD', D2.ITM_LCT_FLOR_NO_VAL, #{session.langId}) || ' ' || F_CMZ_CD_NM('TNT_WELLS', 'LCT_MAT_GRP_CD', D2.ITM_LCT_MAT_GRP_CD, #{session.langId}) ) AS ITM_LCT_NM FROM TB_PDBS_PD_BAS D1 /* 상품기본 */ LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_SVST_CST_SV_ITM_LCT_IZ D2 /* 고객서비스품목위치내역 */ ON D2.ITM_PD_CD = D1.PD_CD AND D2.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND D2.WARE_NO = #{wareNo} LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_SVST_CST_SV_ITM_STOC_IZ D3 /* 고객서비스품목재고내역 */ ON D3.ITM_PD_CD = D1.PD_CD AND D3.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND D3.WARE_NO = #{wareNo} INNER JOIN TB_PDBS_PD_ECOM_PRP_DTL D4 /* 상품각사속성상세 */ ON D4.PD_CD = D1.PD_CD INNER JOIN TB_SVST_MCBY_WARE_IZ D5 /* 월별창고내역 */ ON 1 = 1 WHERE D1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND D1.PD_TP_CD = 'M' AND D4.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND D4.PD_EXTS_PRP_GRP_CD = 'PART' AND D5.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND D5.APY_YM = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMM') AND D1.PD_CD = #{itmPdCd} AND D5.WARE_NO = #{wareNo} ORDER BY PD_ABBR_NM, ITM_PD_CD

SELECT T1.WARE_NO AS CODE_ID , T1.WARE_NM AS CODE_NAME , T1.WARE_DV_CD FROM TB_SVST_MCBY_WARE_IZ T1 WHERE T1.APY_YM = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMM') AND T1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND ( T1.WARE_NO = '100002' OR ( T1.WARE_DV_CD = '2' AND T1.WARE_DTL_DV_CD = '20' ) ) AND ( T1.WARE_NM LIKE '%센터' OR T1.WARE_NM LIKE '%지점' ) ORDER BY T1.WARE_DV_CD, T1.WARE_USE_YN DESC, T1.WARE_NM ASC, T1.WARE_NO ASC

SELECT D1.PD_CD AS ITM_PD_CD , D1.PD_ABBR_NM AS PD_ABBR_NM , D1.SAP_MAT_CD , D4.PD_PRP_VAL19 AS ITM_KND_CD , D5.WARE_NO , D5.WARE_NM , D5.STD_WARE_USE_YN , D3.PITM_STOC_A_GD_QTY , D2.WARE_TP_CD , TRIM(D2.ITM_LCT_ANGLE_VAL) AS ITM_LCT_ANGLE_VAL , D2.ITM_LCT_COF_VAL , D2.ITM_LCT_FLOR_NO_VAL , D2.ITM_LCT_MAT_GRP_CD , D2.WARE_TP_CD || TRIM(D2.ITM_LCT_ANGLE_VAL) || D2.ITM_LCT_COF_VAL || D2.ITM_LCT_FLOR_NO_VAL || D2.ITM_LCT_MAT_GRP_CD AS LOCATION_CD , TRIM( F_CMZ_CD_NM('TNT_WELLS', 'WARE_TP_CD', D2.WARE_TP_CD, #{session.langId}) || ' ' || F_CMZ_CD_NM('TNT_WELLS', 'LCT_ANGLE_CD', D2.ITM_LCT_ANGLE_VAL, #{session.langId}) || ' ' || F_CMZ_CD_NM('TNT_WELLS', 'LCT_COF_CD', D2.ITM_LCT_COF_VAL, #{session.langId}) || ' ' || F_CMZ_CD_NM('TNT_WELLS', 'LCT_FLOR_NO_CD', D2.ITM_LCT_FLOR_NO_VAL, #{session.langId}) || ' ' || F_CMZ_CD_NM('TNT_WELLS', 'LCT_MAT_GRP_CD', D2.ITM_LCT_MAT_GRP_CD, #{session.langId}) ) AS ITM_LCT_NM FROM TB_PDBS_PD_BAS D1 /* 상품기본 */ LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_SVST_CST_SV_ITM_LCT_IZ D2 /* 고객서비스품목위치내역 */ ON D2.ITM_PD_CD = D1.PD_CD AND D2.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND D2.WARE_NO = #{wareNo} LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_SVST_CST_SV_ITM_STOC_IZ D3 /* 고객서비스품목재고내역 */ ON D3.ITM_PD_CD = D1.PD_CD AND D3.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND D3.WARE_NO = #{wareNo} INNER JOIN TB_PDBS_PD_ECOM_PRP_DTL D4 /* 상품각사속성상세 */ ON D4.PD_CD = D1.PD_CD INNER JOIN TB_SVST_MCBY_WARE_IZ D5 /* 월별창고내역 */ ON 1 = 1 WHERE D1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND D1.PD_TP_CD = 'M' AND D4.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND D4.PD_EXTS_PRP_GRP_CD = 'PART' AND D5.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND D5.APY_YM = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMM') AND D1.PD_CD = #{itmPdCd} AND D5.WARE_NO = #{wareNo} ORDER BY ITM_PD_CD
